document_data.mainbody:
Morning stars of confusion were enchanted bludgeons of unassuming appearance.
The weapon consisted of a wooden shaft and a spiked golden head. It was around  long. The golden head was magically hardened to avoid the metals malleability.
These morning stars were enhanced with a +1 enchantment that aided the wielders hand, guiding it towards the target as well as improving the punishment dealt. Additionally, they had a chance of rendering the target creature confused and disoriented for a short period of time.
One morning star of confusion could be found in the top levels of the Dragons Eye caverns on the Spine of the World circa the .
